name: GHA Monorepo Using Composite Actions
description: Use node-setup-cache and lint-typecheck-build composites per package.

files.template:
name: Monorepo Composites

on: [push, pull_request]

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      matrix:
        pkg: ['packages/a', 'packages/b']
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: ./.github/actions/node-setup-cache
      - name: Build one
        working-directory: ${{ matrix.pkg }}
        uses: ./.github/actions/lint-typecheck-build
